messages.subject: Christianity and witchcraft
messages.msgSnippet: The show was banned for a short while. Now he can watch it and enjoy it without it taking over his daily life.  It wasn t a good thing to watch if he
messages.messageBody:
"The show was banned for a short while. Now he can watch it and enjoy it
without it 'taking over' his daily life. It wasn't a good thing to watch if
he couldn't determine what was real and what was not."

This is why all parents should really study child development!! To understand these types of behaviors. A child that is very young can NOT possibly make a clear distinction between reality and imaginary. It's ok, really.
It's part of their development to slowly start seeing the difference and nothing you ban or do or say is going to speed that process up. In fact, it's very HEALTHY and should be encouraged, not prohibited.

Ren



"I never teach my pupils; I only attempt to provide the conditions in which they can learn."
Albert Einstein
